Title: Azure In a Day
Description:
This is the project to help students understand how to build a Azure solution using the following technologies

1. Azure Storage (Queue and Blob)
2. SQL Azure
3. AppFabric Access Control Service
4. AppFabric Service Bus
5. ASP.NET MVC 3
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is the project to help students understand how to build a Azure solution using the following technologies

1. Azure Storage (Queue and Blob)
2. SQL Azure
3. AppFabric Access Control Service
4. AppFabric Service Bus
5. ASP.NET MVC 3


The initial project is based on Steve Marx's demo with some tweaks in it. It is presented for the first time in Kuala Lumpur at Cloud Computing: Adapts to the Changing Needs of Business event.
https://msevents.microsoft.com/CUI/EventDetail.aspx?EventID=1032488969

Download the source code and PowerPoint slides here http://azureoneday.codeplex.com/releases/view/69842

The demo site is at http://ipsazuredemo.cloudapp.net/
